price: Nígbà tí òkùnkùn alẹ́ bò ó mọ́lẹ̀, ó rí ìràwọ̀ kan, ó sọ pé: “Èyí ni olúwa mi.” Nígbà tí ó wọ̀, ó sọ pé: “Èmi kò nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí àwọn (olúwa) tó ń wọ̀ọ̀kùn.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَنَّ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلَّيۡلُ رَءَا كَوۡكَبٗاۖ قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّيۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَآ أُحِبُّ ٱلۡأٓفِلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā janna ʿalayhi al-laylu raā kawkaban qāla hādhā rabbī falammā afala qāla lā uḥibbu al-āfilīna
